code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";const PREFIX="cvs-codepen-clone-";export default function useLocalStorage(key,initialValue){const prefixedKey=PREFIX+key;const[value,setValue]=useState(()=>{const jsonValue=localStorage.getItem(prefixedKey);if(jsonValue!=null)return JSON.parse(jsonValue);if(typeof initialValue==="function"){return initialValue();}else{return initialValue;}});useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem(prefixedKey,JSON.stringify(value));},[prefixedKey,value]);return[value,setValue];}
